channel.title: Comments on: Anybody want to buy some pinkeye?!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/anybody-want-to-buy-some-pinkeye/#comment-352">Suzi</a>.
I was JUST looking at this one yesterday! Good lookin' out, gurl! Thanks for the heads up on the wall anchors too, that would have really frustrated me.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

I was JUST looking at this one yesterday! Good lookin’ out, gurl! Thanks for the heads up on the wall anchors too, that would have really frustrated me.

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: Grossness of this aside, I literally just bought an acrylic nail polish rack last week. I recently turned my guest bedroom closet into a kick-ass vanity area, and getting my polishes organized was at the top of my list of things to do. I had zero luck looking for one locally, but this one on Amazon looked cheap and had great reviews. A 96 bottle holder did not sound excessive for my collection...and I was right. Super easy to get mounted on the wall (although the hubby did add some anchors not provided) and it looks awesome. If you haven't found one already, take a look at this. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004VN31JO/ref=oh_details_o02_s00_i00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
item.content:encoded: Grossness of this aside, I literally just bought an acrylic nail polish rack last week. I had zero luck looking for one locally, but this one on Amazon looked cheap and had great reviews. A 96 bottle holder did not sound excessive for my collection…and I was right. Super easy to get mounted on the wall (although the hubby did add some anchors not provided) and it looks awesome. If you haven’t found one already, take a look at this. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004VN31JO/ref=oh_details_o02_s00_i00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
